text:
Christian Jacob (born 4 December 1959) is a French politician. He was the Minister of French Civil Service in Jacques Chirac's second term as President of France. Before being appointed to cabinet position in 2002, he was deputy for the 4th circonscription of Seine-et-Marne (Provins).
He was the President of the CNJA ("Centre National des Jeunes Agriculteurs") from 1992 to 1994.
In 2019, he was President of The Republicans.
